title: Understanding the Filter Area
text: The filter area in a PivotTable allows you to focus on specific data by applying criteria to the dataset. It helps in narrowing down the data displayed in the PivotTable.

title: Components of the Filter Area
text: The filter area typically includes a report filter and a filter button. These components work together to display a subset of data that meets the specified criteria.

hintAnswer: report filter and filter button in the PivotTable, representing a subset that meets a selection criterion
title: Identifying the Correct Answer
text: Which of the following best describes the filter area in a PivotTable?
choices: report filter and filter button in the PivotTable, representing a subset that meets a selection criterion
fields directly added to the columns fields should contain summary numeric area
fields added to the rows area become subsets of the first field
fields added to the values area must contain numeric data from the source data
